name: ROB-BOT
description:
ROB-BOT was developed in 72 hours for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0

Boy meets Bot in this action packed, top down racing shooter extravaganza. In order to one day become a super rich billionaire playboy, you must first Collaborate with an AI.

CONTROLS:

SPACEBAR - Start Game/ Back to Menu after Game Over

A/D - Driving left and right

Mouse/Left Click - Aim and Shoot

CREDITS:

Apox Games Studio

Programmer: Nate Dalessio

Art: Tyler Payne

Sound and Music: Sean Miles
